Start a career
you can count on

We are always looking for reliable solo and team drivers! If you want to work with us we would like to arrange an interview to discuss details and opportunities which are open for you in Alex Sky. Drivers with different experience and without it are always welcome in Alex Sky.


In our company you can earn your dream salary and even more! If you have a lot of years of experience and high qualification we can surely fully appreciate it! You will be fully paid in Alex Sky.


We are a steady developing company and we look forward to meeting employees who want to grow with us. Join us today and make sure that you have chosen the right company on orientation day. Build your career with Alex Sky!

Why alex sky ?

We work to deliver the best possible combination of fair price and high service in the shipping industry. Alex Sky is a regional expert with a network in 48 states and we have the knowledge and resources to provide innovative, cost-effective shipping solutions every time you need it.

Alex Skyâ€™s mission is to provide:

1) High service

We seek to provide our customers with the best logistics services in the industry and respond and fulfill customer requests as soon as possible.

2) Smart price

Alex Sky provides affordable delivery services to our customers.

3) Integrity and Honesty

We keep our customers informed at all times.
When we run into delays or any problems, we strive to be open, honest and work it out in a fair and professional manner.

4) Safety

We pay high attention to safety in all aspects of our operations by empowering all of our employees and employing professional drivers.

Our advantages:

  • Extensive experience in the US
  • Steady track record of consistent and profitable growth
  • Experienced and fully equipped drivers
  • 2 full service regional terminals
  • A progressive and entrepreneurial culture
  • Serving companies of all sizes

No matter what direction your business takes you or what you need to ship, Alex Sky will cover you. Our innovative transportation and experience will help optimize your supply chain at every turn. We have the flexibility and different services to meet any change in your supply chain. In our fleet we have dry vans, reefers and flatbeds which can handle many types of delivery.

Our history

2016

Later this year our firm came with the company's first client as an independent shipping company. Reputation of our firm grew with this partnership.

Demand for our services grew fast and we hired the first employee to help us deal with the financial side of our business.

2017

Four more employees were brought on board. Considering customer convenience, Alex Sky opened a new terminal and repair shop in Jacksonville FL. It helped to ease drop-off and pick-up access for customers in the area.

Our family grew as well. Alex Sky relocated to an office space to accommodate the addition of an accountant and new sales agent.

This year we increased our customer base and bought some new trucks.

2018

Growth of our company continued with the hiring of dispatchers, logistics coordinators and drivers.

Alex Sky started looking for new ways to make the cargo shipping services more efficient and easier for consumers. To evolve our digital services, we formed partnerships with some software developers. Our mission was to push the limits of modern technology to make clients' experience more pleasant and effective.

2019

Several new corporate moving and relocation companies began leveraging Alex Sky expertise, spurring growth of 21% for the companyâ€™s services.

The reputation of the company continues to extend with growing numbers of clients. Customers include thousands of satisfied corporate clients as well as individuals.

Our family continued to grow too. We hired more drivers for our trucks and owner operators as well as sales agents and marketer.

2020

This year we broke our records with a 31% increase in retail bookings.

Alex Sky opens a terminal and repair shop in Chicago. Strong demand for shipping goods from Illinois to other States provided us the opportunity to set up a fully staffed trucking operation in Chicago. This operation allowed customers to take better control on moving freight between Illinois and Florida.

This year we bought some new trucks, including Dry Van, Reefer and Flatbed hoping to meet clients' growing demand.

2021

We delivered over 150,000 cargo and demand continues to grow.

Alex Sky changed company policy to offer remote work to keep employees safe during the pandemic. Productivity remained steady and both the retail and business-to-business lines KPI kept growing.

This year we moved our headquarters from Jacksonville FL to Chicago IL, creating an office space with conference rooms, workstations and lounge area.
